{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Compex |model=WPJ344 |revision=LV |est_release_date=2013 |fcc_date=08/22/2014 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=Yes |type=wireless embedded board, general purpose |fcc_id=TK4WPJ344 |pwr_v=9-24 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=ns |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9344 |cpu1_cspeed=533 |fla1=8 |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header |serial=yes,, 4-pin header |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9344 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=2 |flags= |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=abgn }} '''2.4GHz 2Ã—2 Wireless Embedded Board with Mini PCIe Slot''' :[http://www.compex.com.sg/product/wpj344/ Product page]
===Product Key Features=== *[[Qualcomm Atheros]] AR9344 MIPS 74Kc 560MHz CPU *128MB System Memory *16MB NOR Flash *On-board 2.4GHz max 23dBm output power (per chain) *802.11n compliant & backward compatible with 802.11b/g *2x2 On-board radio up to 300Mbps physical data rate *1x Mini PCI Express Slot at 9.2mm height *2x Gigabit LAN RJ45 with Auto-MDI/X *Passive 24V Power Over Ethernet
===Applications=== *Optimized for 802.11ac Module Support *802.11b/g/n Access Point *Point-to-Point High Capacity Wireless Bridge *Point-to-Multipoint High Capacity Wireless Bridge *Wireless Base Station *Wireless Customer-Premises Equipment (CPE)
===Purchase Sample=== [http://shop.compex.com.sg/wpj344hv.html Compex System Sample Store]
===Others=== '''Compex''' is marketing this device as an ''802.11ac ready'' device - it is designed to be accompanied with a large form-factor Mini PCIe 11ac radio (like the [[Compex WLE900N5|WLE900N5]] or [[Compex WLE900N5-23|WLE900N5-23]]), though [http://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/w/index.php?title=Special%3AAsk&q=%5B%5BBrand%3A%3ACompex%5D%5D+%5B%5BModel%3A%3A~*WLE*%5D%5D&po=%3FInterface%0D%0A%3FFCC+ID%0D%0A%3FManuf%0D%0A%3FOEM+model%0D%0A%3FVendor+ID%0D%0A%3FDevice+ID%0D%0A%3FSubvendor+ID%0D%0A%3FSubdevice+ID%0D%0A%3FChip1+model%0D%0A%3FChip2+model%0D%0A%3FSupported+802dot11+protocols%3DPHY+modes%0D%0A%3FMIMO+status%0D%0A%3FOUI%0D%0A%3FEstimated+year+of+release%3DEst.+year%0D%0A&eq=yes&p%5Bformat%5D=broadtable&sort_num=&order_num=ASC&p%5Blimit%5D=500&p%5Boffset%5D=&p%5Blink%5D=all&p%5Bsort%5D=&p%5Bheaders%5D=show&p%5Bmainlabel%5D=&p%5Bintro%5D=&p%5Boutro%5D=&p%5Bsearchlabel%5D=%E2%80%A6+further+results&p%5Bdefault%5D=&p%5Bclass%5D=sortable+wikitable+smwtable&eq=yes all '''WLE''' series radios] are [https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=467553173325542&l=967b6a1662 noted as being supported].
The datasheet provided by '''Compex''' states there are two item codes for the board... *[[Compex WPJ344LV 6A03PC8128BR|WPJ344LV 6A03PC8128BR]] - '''LV''' (low-voltage - 24 VDC) variant **9 to 24 VDC via DC jack, 12 to 24 VDC through PoE *[[Compex WPJ344HV 6A03PC8128BR|WPJ344HV 6A03PC8128BR]] - '''HV''' (high-voltage - 48 VDC) variant **24 to 48 VDC via DC jack, 24 to 48 VDC through PoE Additional information, per the datasheet, follows... *"C-344JPW 6A02" is appears to be silkscreened on the board. *Power consumption (board only): 5 W *Dimensions: [[Dimensions::117 mm x 105 mm x 17 mm]] *RoHS compliant *A USB extension board (w/ 2x Female A and 1x USB-only Mini PCIe) is (optionally) available
"C-344JPW 6A01" is silkscreened on the board pictured in the prelimary datasheet.
==Additional external links== [http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/compex/wpj344 On the '''OpenWrt Wiki''']
__NOTOC__
